events.message: I received my package today, but unfortunately the product has a large scratch on the screen and it appears to be defective.
The issue has been categorized as a product defect based on the customer's description of damage and scratches on the item.
Assigning the case to the product support team to investigate and provide a resolution for the defective item reported.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the damage to your product. I’m here to help you get this resolved quickly.
Could you please provide us with photos of the scratches and any other damage visible on the product so we can assess the situation?
I’ve attached multiple photos showing scratches on the screen and some dents on the side of the device. It looks like it was damaged before delivery.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer a full replacement or a refund. Please let us know your preferred option and we will expedite the process.
I would prefer a replacement as soon as possible because I really need the product for upcoming work.
We have arranged for a replacement product to be shipped out today with expedited delivery. You will receive tracking details shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the replacement product and that it arrived in perfect condition. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Yes, the replacement arrived today and everything is perfect. Thank you very much for your quick support!
We are glad your issue was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing the case now, and please don’t hesitate to contact us again in the future.
